uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hbase

Class HBaseAutoWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hbase.HBaseAutoWriter

  • public abstract class HBaseAutoWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Facilitates automatic transfer between any AutoWritable instance and HBase provided that:
    1) the unqualified class name of the AutoWritable is the same as the name of a table in HBase
    2) for every field in the AutoWritable descendant type there is a corresponding HBase column with name "f1:[col name]"
    See Also:
    AutoWritable

      • getKey

        public static byte[] getKey(AutoWritable w)
        Grabs the byte array key for any AutoWritable. Generates bytes from fields annotated with HBaseKey, representing them in their declared order as strings joined by a delimiter character.7
        Parameters:
        w - AutoWritable to analyse.
        Returns:
        Corresponding byte[] key.

      • put

        public static void put(AutoWritable w)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Inserts/updates a row in the HBase table corresponding to the given AutoWritable. Each field is put in its own column. Requires that all the fields are non-null writables.
        Parameters:
        w - AutoWritable containing the data to update from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Performs a get operation using the provided key and returns the result in a new instance of the given type.
        Parameters:

      • get

        public static void get(AutoWritable w)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the row in HBase with the key getKey(w) and sets all the fields in w based on the result of the get. Requires that all fields in w are non-null writables.
        Parameters:
        w - AutoWritable on which getTableName() is to be called.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
